tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicalTeam (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    assistant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    nurse_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    robot_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE surgeons (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(255),
  experience_years INT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_name VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  surgeon_id INT,
  assistant1_id INT,
  assistant2_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (surgeon_id) REFERENCES surgeons(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (assistant1_id) REFERENCES surgeons(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (assistant2_id) REFERENCES surgeons(id)
);

CREATE TABLE procedures (
    procedure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name TEXT,
    team_id UUID,
    surgeon_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (surgeon_id) REFERENCES surgeons(surgeon_id)
);

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
   surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   surgery_name VARCHAR,
   date DATE,
   surgeon_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (surgeon_id) REFERENCES surgeons(id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
   patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR,
   age INT,
   surgery_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (surgery_id) REFERENCES surgeries(surgery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_procedures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name VARCHAR(100),
    complexity_level VARCHAR(50),
    lead_surgeon_id INT,
    date_time DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_team_assignments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    procedure_id INT,
    assignment_date DATETIME,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);
